name.description: Display name of the template (e.g., 'Hero Banner', 'Text Block')

description.description: Description of what this element does

icon.description: Icon identifier for the palette (lucide-react icon name)

category.description: Category for organizing templates in the palette

default_content.description: Default content structure for new instances of this element

available_variants.description: Available style variants for this element type

content_schema.description: JSON schema describing the content fields for this element (for form generation)

is_active.description: Whether this template is available for use

display_order.description: Order in which this template appears in the palette
